markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Implausible Infiltration](/Feats.aspx?ID=4986) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); [Quick Squeeze](/Feats.aspx?ID=5199)

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to a floor or vertical wall

</column>

---

You find tiny imperfections and somehow fit yourself through them, possibly moving directly through the wall or floor. Your movement attempt fails if the wall or floor is made of something other than wood, plaster, or stone; is thicker than 10 feet; or contains even a thin layer of metal. If you have a climb Speed, you can use this ability to attempt to move through a ceiling.
name: Implausible Infiltration
requirement: You are adjacent to a floor or vertical wall
requirement_markdown: You are adjacent to a floor or vertical wall

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 18" pfs="Standard" > Implausible Infiltration Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 177 2.0 Prerequisites Legendary in Acrobatics; Quick Squeeze Requirements You are adjacent to a floor or vertical wall --- You find tiny imperfections and somehow fit yourself through them, possibly moving directly through the wall or floor. Your movement attempt fails if the wall or floor is made of something other than wood, plaster, or stone; is thicker than 10 feet; or contains even a thin layer of metal. If you have a climb Speed, you can use this ability to attempt to move through a ceiling.
